description:
The evil within Mt. Hakurei is Naraku`s demons and Kagura. Miroku risks his life to save Sango, by opening his Wind Tunnerl and sucking in the demons along with the poisonous bugs. But he uses up his power and collapses.
Source: hulu

titles.title: En el fondo del monte de las ánimas
In den Tiefen des Berges Hakurei
Into the Depths of Mt. Hakurei
